attributes.action: keep big AL and the Doc on iow radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It will be a sad day on the south coast if the fools that are the iow radio management take big al and the doc off of the radio.Stand up and be counted the doc needs you ,oh yeah and alex.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
